Responsibilities
Responsible for data analysis work related to international product search business
Lead a team in conducting in-depth analysis within the business domain. Identify optimization points that can enhance the user search experience across various products based on business logic. Provide clear and actionable optimization solutions, and collaborate with product, operations, algorithm, and development teams to implement these solutions, resulting in actual business growth
Lead the team in designing and analyzing various A/B experiments within the search business, evaluating product optimization outcomes, assessing market activity impact, analyzing fluctuations in key metrics, and establishing data systems
Stay informed about industry trends and gain insights into the search business. Offer directional analysis guidance to the search business, participate in critical business decisions, and provide solutions to key and challenging issues within the search business
Responsible for building specialized models to support the business
Qualification
Represents the skills you have Find out how your skills align with this job's requirements. If anything seems off, you can easily click on the tags to select or unselect skills to reflect your actual expertise. SQL

Learning Ability
Required
Bachelor's degree or higher, with a preference for majors in mathematics, statistics, or computer-related fields
Data-sensitive with the ability to quickly grasp business concepts, uncover business details, and establish connections between data
Proficient in SQL, with experience in R, Python, or other scripting languages
Possess machine learning capabilities, including regression, classification, and clustering
Preferred
Experience in internet data analysis is a plus
Prior experience in search business and team management is a plus
Strong communication and teamwork skills
Strong learning ability and curiosity
Keen interest in the internet industry with a desire for long-term development within the field
Benefits
Medical, dental, and vision insurance
A 401(k) savings plan with company match
Paid parental leave
Short-term and long-term disability coverage
Life insurance
Wellbeing benefits
10 paid holidays per year
10 paid sick days per year
17 days of Paid Personal Time (prorated upon hire with increasing accruals by tenure)
